title: Elementalist Lux Background art not working??? but WHY????
body:
Hi, I am a lux main who loves the Elementalist Lux skin.
 I bought it a while back (when old client still worked) and I had the active Elementalist Lux as the background art of my profile page. This was fine in the new client as well until I started playing other champs and my background art changed multiple times. When I got Lux back as the background art, it was the classic lux there and not the Elementalist lux. 
This is quite important to me because although classic lux is pretty, I like her with more hair showing- which is true for elementalist lux. 

Please help me. I tried looking up other forums and still don't know what to do. This problem is harder than landing a lux Q on fiddlesticks{{champion:9}}

replies.body: This could be a bug!  What happens if you equip one of the Elementalist Lux summoner icons?

Oh lol, thanks a lot. I did as you said (equipped a Elementalist Lux icon) and it worked. So I guess it was me switching around icons that caused this "problem". 
And it was intentional that a person has to have an Elementalist Lux icon on for the Elementalist Lux background art to work?
Edit: oh... it works the same way with my DJ Sona icons. Sorry for wasting your time, it wasn't a bug or problem at all. Thank you so much!
now that this is solved, time to hit the fiddle
